data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fang, Yongqin, Xing, Jichun (2018): Review of the leafhopper genus Longicornus Li & Song (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4462 (3): 435-442, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4462.3.9|14 occurrences
